title: Two great Star Trek shows revive the lost art of the gimmicky crossover episode
description: Lower Decks and Strange New Worlds have a lot of fun blending their styles.

title: Here’s the trailer for the live-action One Piece we’ve been waiting for
description: Netflix has a mixed track record when it comes to adapting beloved Japanese anime.

title: Long-forgotten frozen soil sample offers a warning for the future
description: Ancient soil was buried under a mile of ice until excavated during the Cold War.

title: Amazon is getting ready to launch a lot of broadband satellites
description: Amazon unveils satellite facility in Florida, may switch prototype launch to Atlas V
